descriptionHtml:
This data is what has turned into the UNP-BBP meshes.
Is required [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48793/]UNP Naughty Remodel - Standalone[/url]
We plan to increase the file in the future, but I'm not going to do because it is unnatural and metal armor and shake.
In addition, I've used "NifSkope" and "BodySlide2" to create this data.


option file

A: Clothes of RedGuard (version without cloak)
B: Some of the data of "SliderSets" read by "Bodyslide2"


Answers to some problems

Q: If you put this MOD, MOD equipment and some other ornaments'm no longer appear?
A: You may be part of a skirt and stockings is using the "bodyslot" another in the original data.
Because it is in the slot 32 in all this data, please correct the ESP in terms of the introduction of this data.

Q: texture of a black "minerclothes" is I do not have been applied correctly.
A: Open the ESP in CK, and I fix it if it does it again to set the texture set with armor add-on.

Q: the color of the clothes of the mage is not applied correctly
A: Open the ESP in CK, and I fix it if it does it again to set the texture set with armor add-on.

Q: Meshes of the body, but it seems sometimes penetrate the clothes?
A: This is the limit in the art of their own now, please accept with generosity.

Q: Movement of the skirt is'm unnatural?
A: Please forgive me because it is a problem of bone weight.

Q: Body shape when I wore I do not like not good enough.
A: You are correct to some extent, but somehow in my last.
